plot: Popeye wants to join a club of fighters. But can he take their grueling initiation test... and can the club take his rough-housing?
title: Can You Take It
plot_es: Popeye wants to join a club of fighters. But can he take their grueling initiation test... and can the club take his rough-housing?
plot_en: Popeye wants to join a club of fighters. But can he take their grueling initiation test... and can the club take his rough-housing?
